name: Dataraider 2
description:
The exciting sequel to Dataraider. Featuring 9 guns, co-op multiplayer, animations, and more.

How to install:

Download the .zip file that corresponds to your operating system and right click > extract all. In the new folder, run either the .exe or .app file.

How to play:

Interact with the board on the wall to select a mission or join a game. Click on "Bootcamp" to select the tutorial mission.

How to exit:

Windows key > Right click on Dataraider > Close window
